name: A. Divide it
statement:
You are given an integer n.You can perform any of the following
operations with this number an arbitrary (possibly, zero) number of
times: Replace n with
frac{n}{2} if n is divisible by 2; Replace n with
frac{2n}{3} if n is divisible by 3; Replace n with
frac{4n}{5} if n is divisible by 5. For example, you can replace 30 with
15 using the first operation, with 20 using the second operation or with
24 using the third operation.Your task is to find the minimum number of
moves required to obtain 1 from n or say that it is impossible to do
it.You have to answer q independent queries.
